name: Eques
description:
Greetings!

Eques is a chess game that we play only with knights with its unique mechanics

Does It Have a Story?

There is no story but chess is cool bro

This game was made in 2 weeks with 64x64 theme for LOWREZJAM 2022 hosted by Jack Oatley and Gurpreet Singh Matharoo

Controls

Click: Select Target & Go Target
Space: Change Path
Play: Your Brain

Who Play This Game?

• Those who like to unique chess games
• LOWREZJAM participants
• Knights and (maybe) Minotaurs
• Our friends who are curious about the game we made (Nobody)

System Requirements

You can even play on a Chess Board

Credits

Yavuz Burak Yalçın - Game Designer & Programmer
Alperen Güner - Game Designer & Pixel Artist
Enver Yeşilşiraz - Musician & Sound Designer
